item.description:
Trip Coordinator (TC): Rabbi Katy Allen of Ma'yan Tikvah
EVENT: What is Jewish about a walk in the woods? This leisurely walk will be punctuated by a series of brief meditations and activities that will help us experience the natural world through a Jewish lens. Short texts and blessings, some more familiar and some less so will add to the experience.
RSVP: Preferred to rabbi@mayantikvah.org
MEET: We will meet in the parking lot on Totten Pond Road. Prospect Hill Park, 381 Totten Pond Road, Waltham (Public transportation is available via MBTA bus 70A)
COST: Free

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Jewish Walk in the Woods
